doc.field: - Waxman Industries Inc is raising 25 mln dlrs through an offering of convertible subordinated debentures due 2007 with a 6-1/4 pct coupon and par pricing, said sole underwriter Drexel Burnham Lambert Inc. The debentures are convertible into the company's common stock at 14.375 dlrs per share, representing a premium of 25 pct over the stock price when terms on the debt were set. Moody's Investors Service Inc rates the debentures B-2. Proceeds will be used to repay short and long-term indebtedness.
